data.name: Tower!3D - EDDS airport
data.detailed_description:
Tower!3D Pro – EDDS airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro giving you an additional airport for your controlling challenge.

Stuttgart is a single runway medium size airport in Germany. It’s a perfect sized airport for testing your skills on less demanding traffic and with the optional Real Traffic for Tower!3D pro you will also receive a nice mix of general aviation airplanes inserted into the flow of jet airlines.

MATCHING REAL COLOR AVAILABLE on FeelThere's website

data.short_description: Tower!3D Pro – EDDS airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro giving you an additional airport for your controlling challenge.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Tower!3D
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB dedicated video card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Tower!3D
